Hi there. Just stopping by after my first two days of KSP. Great game, it's the most fun I've had in weeks. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I have one suggestion though. I'm not a fan of the instant launch. Could we get an optional timed launch? Looks cool and could be pretty useful when we forget to set their stages, or add mystery goo containers. I tend to remember that kinda stuff a second or so after launching. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
uhm, something like [Launch CountDown](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/42859) perhaps? (Of course, if you like using add-ons)

> 
> Hi there. Just stopping by after my first two days of KSP. Great game, it's the most fun I've had in weeks. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> I have one suggestion though. I'm not a fan of the instant launch. Could we get an optional timed launch? Looks cool and could be pretty useful when we forget to set their stages, or add mystery goo containers. I tend to remember that kinda stuff a second or so after launching. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I agree. I would like this as a medium/hard difficulty feature.

> 
> I agree. I would like this as a medium/hard difficulty feature.

How would it affect the difficulty? It's not like it makes the game harder if you have to wait five seconds before launching.

(Also, 300th post!)
